author: cecilecaillol
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is to include the L1TCaloSummary emulator into the L1TCaloLayer1 package.
The input to the emulator are the regions produced by L1TCaloLayer1: < L1CaloRegionCollection >.
The output of the emulator is the L1boosted object collection of type vector < l1extra::L1JetParticle >.

EDProducer: L1Trigger/L1TCaloLayer1/plugins/L1TCaloSummary.cc
Config to run the EDProducer:
L1Trigger/L1TCaloLayer1/python/uct2016EmulatorDigis_cfi.py

NOTE: To run uct2016EmulatorDigis it is now essential to run simCaloStage2Layer1Digis that will produce the regions.

#### PR validation:

Rates and efficiency studies presented to L1 DPG:
https://indico.cern.ch/event/1023711/#8-boosted-object-identificatio

Recipe to run an analyzer for the L1boosted performance:
https://github.com/pallabidas/Run3Ntuplizer/tree/L1boosted_L1TOffline

Rebase of https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/920 and https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/907
title: L1T Phase-1: Adding L1boosted objects
